RS Asset Management

Asset management and analytics beyond the edge of investment

Our philosophy is built around maximizing returns per unit of risk in a reliable way.
Check our portfolios

Our Core Strategies

We operate a diversified set of uncorrelated strategies, each selected for its exceptional risk-adjusted return potential. Only strategies that meet our stringent Sharpe ratio and maximum drawdown criteria are productionized.

Built by Industry Veterans

Our founding team brings decades of combined experience from some of the world's most successful hedge funds. Having navigated multiple market cycles at top-tier institutions, we understand what separates consistent performers from the rest: discipline, adaptability, and an unwavering focus on risk-adjusted returns. We've built this firm on those principles.
